name: SaaS Modern
description: Clean, information-dense UI for productivity and SaaS applications.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Maximize information density. White space is for separation, not decoration. Clean, refined, and tool-like aesthetic.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Use a crisp white background with subtle gray borders. Primary blue used sparingly for key actions.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Use outline icons. Ghost buttons for secondary actions. Avoid heavy shadows or rounded corners larger than 4px.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure high contrast for text. Focus states must be clear.
